title: Russia Targets Civilian Areas in Ukraine, Threatens Kyiv After Missile Strike on Kharkiv
content:
1. Russia Targets Civilian Areas in Ukraine, Threatens Kyiv After Missile Strike on Kharkiv  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Russia pummels Ukraine's second-largest city as convoy nears Kyiv  WCNC
  3. 'Nobody will forget': Zelenskyy calls attack on Kharkiv 'a war crime' as 40-mile convoy rolls toward Kyiv: Live updates  USA TODAY
  4. What Happened on Day 5 of Russia’s Invasion of Ukraine  The New York Times
  5. Tuesday briefing: Russian convoy bears down on Kyiv  The Guardian
